title: Inflation Just CEOs Liking Money, Valentine’s Day Dinner / Movie Recs 2.14.22
itunes:title: Inflation Just CEOs Liking Money, Valentine’s Day Dinner / Movie Recs 2.14.22
description:
In episode 1084, Jack and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by animated TV writer Greg Hahn to discuss Is Inflation Just CEOs Raising Prices?, Valentines Day, The Worst Day To Go Out To Dinner!, Best Nontraditional Romantic Movies and more!

  1. Is Inflation Just CEOs Raising Prices?
  2. Fastest Profits Since 1950 Debunk Wage Inflation Story of CEOs
  3. Valentines Day, The Worst Day To Go Out To Dinner!


Follow: @TAGwriters

LISTEN: Afro Blue [feat. Erykah Badu and Phonte] (9th Wonder Blue Light Basement Remix) by Robert Glasper

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
